verbose_text: Finally, in order to confirm the prominent role of astroglial VMAT2 in modulating DA levels, we generated a lentiviral vector that enabled the selective re-expression of VMAT2 in astrocytes [XREF_BIBR] and validated this expression using a lentivirus bearing green fluorescent protein (GFP) (n = 5 mice; Supplementary Figures S3c-h).
